snippet.title: The Method of Hiding a Body| Horror Indie Game| Steam
snippet.description:
Please search on Steam: The Method of Hiding a Body
Coming Soon~
VHS Camera Effects
A story-driven horror puzzle game where the player takes on the role of a resentful ghost, possessing others in order to search for her own corpse.
